ch0002_00_kotone/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was waiting for you!
ch0002_00_kotone/0101_0701_02_10:
Exploring together with friends is
way more fun than going it alone!
ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_01_10: Hehe. My Chikorita is pretty cute, right?
ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_02_10: The leaf on her head is especially cute!
ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_03_10:
If you get close to her head, it feels warm
like the sun, right?
ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_04_10: Looking at Chikorita always reminds me of Johto!
ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0702_01_10:
I guess a person’s hometown is a special place
to them.
ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0702_02_10: I wonder how Grandpa and Grandma are doing.
ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0701_01_10: Do you know the Pokémon named Marill?
ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0701_02_10: It’s a great Pokémon I met back in Johto!
ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0701_03_10:
It’s got a round body like a balloon. 
Don’t you think that makes it really cute?
ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0702_01_10: One time, my Marill fell in the mud.
ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0702_02_10:
And when I caught a whiff of its scent, it smelled
like a dust mop! I was so surprised!
ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0701_01_10:
Seems like even here there’s a lot of people
who know the Johto dialect.
ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0701_02_10:
When other people use the dialect, it starts to
slip out of me, too!
ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0701_03_10:
Do you know Valerie, from Laverre City? Do you
think it’d be cute to talk the way she does?
ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0702_01_10: The Johto region has a lot of really old towns.
ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0702_02_10:
I guess traveling the world makes me realize the
good stuff about where I’m from.
ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0702_03_10: Hmm, could I be feeling a little homesick?
ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_01_10:
Seems like even if you become a great Trainer,
there’ll always be people wanting to 
challenge you.
ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_02_10: Red always gets challenged to Pokémon battles.
ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_03_10: Sometimes I think I’m a little jealous of him.
ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_04_10:
If you’re always battling, 
then there’s no time to play!
ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0702_01_10:
Since we’re on the topic, maybe I should
challenge Red, too.
ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0702_02_10:
We battled before, but was it really a
great battle?
ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_01_10:
I sometimes forget that I’m the senior Trainer
when I’m with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_02_10:
Sometimes it looks like you get along with your
Pokémon better than me, too...
ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_03_10:
and you’ve helped me in Pokémon battles
sometimes, too.
ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_04_10:
OK! I’m going to give it my best so that you
don’t surpass me anymore!
ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0702_01_10:
You can ask me, your senior Trainer,
anything you want to know, OK?
ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0702_02_10:
I’ll show you that I can become
a senior you can count on!
ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0701_01_10:
Ah! Here it is! Have this! It’s a present
from me!
ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0701_02_10:
I used it a long time ago, but I’m OK with
giving it to you!
ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0702_01_10:
I know it’s a hand-me-down, but I’m sure it’ll
really come in handy!
ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0702_02_10:
I’ve got a lot of memories with that item, so
take good care of it!
ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_01_10: Hey, so what’s your relationship with Red like?
ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_02_10:
Oh, that was out of the blue, wasn’t it?
I don’t mean anything weird!
ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_03_10:
There’s something about you that reminds me
of Red, but I can’t quite put my finger on it...
ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_04_10:
Maybe it’s how seriously you take battles or
the way you refuse to lose.
ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_05_10:
It could also be the way you interact 
with your Pokémon. You really cherish 
your Pokémon, don’t you?
ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0702_01_10: I think you can definitely get as strong as Red!
ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_01_10:
Today, as your senior, I’ll give you advice on
whatever you want!
ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_02_10:
If you’re worried or troubled about anything,
just let me know!
ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_04_10: Does this mean I’m an unreliable senior?
ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_05_10:
Ah! It turns out, I’ve got something I’m
worried about!
ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0702_01_10:
It turns out, acting like your senior is
pretty difficult.
ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0702_02_10:
Hmm.
Maybe I should try to act more like myself.
ch0002_00_kotone/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Great day, isn’t it. Come on.
Let’s head out together with our Pokémon!
ch0002_00_kotone/3002_0701_01_10:
I woke up super early.
I just couldn’t wait to see where I’d go today!
ch0002_00_kotone/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m a bit tired...
Guess I was wandering around a little too much.
ch0002_00_kotone/3004_0701_01_10:
I feel like taking a nap, but it just seems like
such a waste to...sleep.
ch0002_00_kotone/3005_0701_01_10:
I bet exploring at night would be fun, too!
Oh man, now I wanna head out!
ch0002_00_kotone/3006_0701_01_10:
Look at all the pretty stars!
I bet trying to count them all would put
you to sleep in no time... *yawn*
